page.title: 12VILLAGE SURVEY-TELEVISION
page.content:
{TELEVISION {} In our survey we found out that most people used colour television to watch television programmes, only four used portable television. The most hours people viewed television or played television games was between one and three hours on a weekday and between one and six hours at the weekend. The most viewing on a weekday was eight hours and the most viewing at the weekend was also eight hours.
In Alne we went asking people which television programme they watched the most. Some said drama and adventure series. The most said drama and all types of progammes. Most of the old people liked adventure series like Murder She Wrote and the A_Team. Younger people liked comedies.
